Package smartcity.lights.abstractions

Interface ICrossroad

public interface ICrossroad
The crossroad object, which contains traffic signallers and holds information about the traffic participants, such as cars, bikes, buses and pedestrians, which are currently waiting at the lights of the crossroad.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean addCarToFarAwayQueue​(long adjacentWayId, ArrivalInfo arrivalInfo)
    Remove car from close queue -- inform that the car will approach a light in the near future.
    boolean addCarToQueue​(long adjacentWayId, java.lang.String agentName)
    Add car to close queue: inform that the car has approached the crossroad.
    boolean addPedestrianToFarAwayQueue​(long adjacentWayId, ArrivalInfo arrivalInfo)  
    boolean addPedestrianToQueue​(long adjacentWayId, java.lang.String agentName)  
    java.util.List<Light> getLights()  
    boolean removeCarFromFarAwayQueue​(long adjacentWayId, java.lang.String agentName)
    Remove car from close queue -- inform that the car is about to approach.
    boolean removeCarFromQueue​(long adjacentWayId)
    Remove car from close queue: inform that the car has just passed the crossroad.
    boolean removePedestrianFromFarAwayQueue​(long adjacentWayId, java.lang.String agentName)  
    boolean removePedestrianFromQueue​(long adjacentWayId)  
    OptimizationResult requestOptimizations​(int extendTimeSeconds)
    Perform optimization at the crossroad -- determine which cars waiting at the light queues should be granted right to pass the crossroad.
    void startLifetime()  

  • Method Details

    • getLights

      java.util.List<Light> getLights()

    • addCarToQueue

      boolean addCarToQueue​(long adjacentWayId, java.lang.String agentName)
      Add car to close queue: inform that the car has approached the crossroad.
      Parameters:
      adjacentWayId - The OSM Way ID adjacent to the light which has been approached by the car.
      agentName - The agent name of the approaching car.
      Returns:
      true if the operation has been successful

    • removeCarFromQueue

      boolean removeCarFromQueue​(long adjacentWayId)
      Remove car from close queue: inform that the car has just passed the crossroad.
      Parameters:
      adjacentWayId - The OSM Way ID adjacent to the light which had the car in the queue.
      Returns:
      true if the operation has been successful

    • addCarToFarAwayQueue

      boolean addCarToFarAwayQueue​(long adjacentWayId, ArrivalInfo arrivalInfo)
      Remove car from close queue -- inform that the car will approach a light in the near future.
      Parameters:
      adjacentWayId - The OSM Way ID adjacent to the light which the car will approach in the future.
      arrivalInfo - The information regarding the car's arrival.
      Returns:
      true if the operation has been successful

    • removeCarFromFarAwayQueue

      boolean removeCarFromFarAwayQueue​(long adjacentWayId, java.lang.String agentName)
      Remove car from close queue -- inform that the car is about to approach.
      Parameters:
      adjacentWayId - The OSM Way ID adjacent to the light which the car is about to approach.
      agentName - The agent name of the car.
      Returns:
      true if the operation has been successful

    • requestOptimizations

      OptimizationResult requestOptimizations​(int extendTimeSeconds)
      Perform optimization at the crossroad -- determine which cars waiting at the light queues should be granted right to pass the crossroad.
      Parameters:
      extendTimeSeconds - The time which shall be the extension of the normal time of the traffic light being green
      Returns:
      The result of the performed optimizations.

    • addPedestrianToQueue

      boolean addPedestrianToQueue​(long adjacentWayId, java.lang.String agentName)

    • removePedestrianFromQueue

      boolean removePedestrianFromQueue​(long adjacentWayId)

    • addPedestrianToFarAwayQueue

      boolean addPedestrianToFarAwayQueue​(long adjacentWayId, ArrivalInfo arrivalInfo)

    • removePedestrianFromFarAwayQueue

      boolean removePedestrianFromFarAwayQueue​(long adjacentWayId, java.lang.String agentName)

    • startLifetime

      void startLifetime()
